title: Wizard generates error code ERC721

body: Maybe I'm wrong, until I close the issue.

How are you compiling this code? It looks like you're compiling with the `master` branch or the 4.8 release candidate but this shouldn't be happening if you use the project in any of the standard ways.

Thanks for the quick response, @frangio.

I use foundry.

```bash
Run forge --version
forge 0.2.0 (c06b532 2022-11-05T00:08:42.49433106Z)
installing solc version "0.8.17"
Successfully installed solc 0.8.17
Compiling 57 files with 0.8.17
Solc 0.8.17 finished in 449.92ms
Error: 
Compiler run failed
error[7792]: TypeError: Function has override specified but does not override anything.
  --> src/TOKEN1.sol:87:9:
   |
87 |         override(ERC721, ERC721Enumerable)
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^



error[2353]: TypeError: Invalid contracts specified in override list: "ERC721" and "ERC721Enumerable".
  --> src/TOKEN1.sol:87:9:
   |
87 |         override(ERC721, ERC721Enumerable)
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Note: This contract: 
  --> lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol:19:1:
   |
19 | contract ERC721 is Context, ERC165, IERC721, IERC721Metadata {
   | ^ (Relevant source part starts here and spans across multiple lines).
Note: This contract: 
  --> lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/extensions/ERC721Enumerable.sol:14:1:
   |
14 | abstract contract ERC721Enumerable is ERC721, IERC721Enumerable {
   | ^ (Relevant source part starts here and spans across multiple lines).



error[6480]: TypeError: Derived contract must override function "_beforeTokenTransfer". Two or more base classes define function with same name and parameter types.
  --> src/TOKEN1.sol:29:1:
   |
29 | contract NFT1 is ERC721, ERC721Enumerable, Pausable, AccessControl {
   | ^ (Relevant source part starts here and spans across multiple lines).
Note: Definition in "ERC721": 
   --> lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol:467:5:
    |
467 |     function _beforeTokenTransfer(
    |     ^ (Relevant source part starts here and spans across multiple lines).
Note: Definition in "ERC721Enumerable": 
  --> lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/extensions/ERC721Enumerable.sol:60:5:
   |
60 |     function _beforeTokenTransfer(
   |     ^ (Relevant source part starts here and spans across multiple lines).



error[7792]: TypeError: Function has override specified but does not override anything.
  --> src/TOKEN2.sol:87:9:
   |
87 |         override(ERC721, ERC721Enumerable)
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^



error[2353]: TypeError: Invalid contracts specified in override list: "ERC721" and "ERC721Enumerable".
  --> src/TOKEN2.sol:87:9:
   |
87 |         override(ERC721, ERC721Enumerable)
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Note: This contract: 
  --> lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol:19:1:
   |
19 | contract ERC721 is Context, ERC165, IERC721, IERC721Metadata {
   | ^ (Relevant source part starts here and spans across multiple lines).
Note: This contract: 
  --> lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/extensions/ERC721Enumerable.sol:14:1:
   |
14 | abstract contract ERC721Enumerable is ERC721, IERC721Enumerable {
   | ^ (Relevant source part starts here and spans across multiple lines).



error[6480]: TypeError: Derived contract must override function "_beforeTokenTransfer". Two or more base classes define function with same name and parameter types.
  --> src/TOKEN2.sol:29:1:
   |
29 | contract NFT2 is ERC721, ERC721Enumerable, Pausable, AccessControl {
   | ^ (Relevant source part starts here and spans across multiple lines).
Note: Definition in "ERC721": 
   --> lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol:467:5:
    |
467 |     function _beforeTokenTransfer(
    |     ^ (Relevant source part starts here and spans across multiple lines).
Note: Definition in "ERC721Enumerable": 
  --> lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC721/extensions/ERC721Enumerable.sol:60:5:
   |
60 |     function _beforeTokenTransfer(
   |     ^ (Relevant source part starts here and spans across multiple lines).



error[6160]: TypeError: Wrong argument count for function call: 3 arguments given but expected 4.
  --> src/TOKEN1.sol:89:9:
   |
89 |         super._beforeTokenTransfer(from, to, tokenId);
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^



error[6160]: TypeError: Wrong argument count for function call: 3 arguments given but expected 4.
  --> src/TOKEN2.sol:89:9:
   |
89 |         super._beforeTokenTransfer(from, to, tokenId);
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^



Error: Process completed with exit code 1.
```

If you use Foundry it's likely you've installed the `master` branch. Please note this is discouraged.

Install as follows:

```
forge install openzeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts@v4.7.3
```

4.8 will be released in a few days anyway, so I might just say you can take a look at the changelog for updating instructions: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#breaking-changes

The Wizard will be updated with 4.8.
Thank you, after the update, the build was completed successfully.
